name: df-cnvrefs
body: |- wceq(ccnvrefs, cab(s0, wbr(cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), ccnv(cssr), cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))))))
comment: Define the class of all converse reflexive sets, see the comment of ~ df-ssr . It is used only by ~ df-cnvrefrels . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 22-Jul-2019.)
